metadata.description: true to use resource or workspace permissions. false to require workspace permissions.
Number of days to retain data in Azure Monitor workspace.
Pricing tier: PerGB2018 or legacy tiers (Free, Standalone, PerNode, Standard or Premium) which are not available to all customers.
The name for this node pool. Node pool must contain only lowercase letters and numbers. For Linux node pools the name cannot be longer than 12 characters.
Set the minimum node count for the cluster.
Set the maximum node count for the cluster.
The size of the virtual machines that will form the nodes in the cluster. This cannot be changed after creating the cluster

The AKS version.
Three scenarios we support for deploying app gateway
Public IP Name for the Application Gateway
The one-line, base64 string of the backend SSL root certificate data.
The one-line, base64 string of the SSL certificate data.
The value of the password for the SSL Certificate
Create Application Gateway ingress for admin console.
Create Application Gateway ingress for remote console.
If true, configure Azure Application Gateway frontend IP with private IP.
Urls of Java EE application packages.
The number of managed server to start.
Scale up once average cpu utilization is larger then the input number
Scale up once average memory utilization is larger then the input number
true to create a new Azure Container Registry.
true to create a new AKS cluster.
If true, the template will update records to the existing DNS Zone. If false, the template will create a new DNS Zone.
One of the supported database types
createOrUpdate: create a new data source connection, or update an existing data source connection. delete: delete an existing data source connection
Urls of datasource drivers, must be specified if database type is otherdb
Datasource driver name, must be specified if database type is otherdb
Determines the transaction protocol (global transaction processing behavior) for the data source.
Managed identity that has access to database
Password for Database
The name of the database table to use when testing physical database connections. This name is required when you specify a Test Frequency and enable Test Reserved Connections.
User id of Database
DNS prefix for ApplicationGateway
Specify a label used to generate subdomain of Admin server. The final subdomain name will be label.dnszoneName, e.g. admin.contoso.xyz
Specify a label used to generate subdomain of Admin server T3 channel. The final subdomain name will be label.dnszoneName, e.g. admin-t3.contoso.xyz
Specify a label used to generate subdomain of WebLogic cluster. The final subdomain name will be label.dnszoneName, e.g. applications.contoso.xyz
Azure DNS Zone name.
JDBC Connection String
true to set up Application Gateway ingress.
true to enable Horizontal Autoscaling.

In addition to the CPU and memory metrics included in AKS by default, you can enable Container Insights for more comprehensive data on the overall performance and health of your cluster. Billing is based on data ingestion and retention settings.
true to create persistent volume using file share.
true to enable cookie based affinity.
Configure a custom channel in Admin Server for the T3 protocol that enables HTTP tunneling
Configure a custom channel in WebLogic cluster for the T3 protocol that enables HTTP tunneling
Enable passwordless datasource connection.
Is the specified SSO account associated with an active Oracle support contract?
JNDI Name for JDBC Datasource
Object array to define Load Balancer service, each object must include service name, service target[admin-server or cluster-1], port.
Name prefix of managed server.
To mitigate ARM-TTK error: Control Named vnetForApplicationGateway must output the newOrExisting property when hideExisting is false
Password of Oracle SSO account.
User name of Oracle SSO account.

Custom Identity Store passphrase
Weblogic Custom Identity Store Type
Custom Trust Store data
Custom Trust Store passphrase
Weblogic Custom Trust Store Type
Alias of the private key
Password of the private key
Tags for the resources.
Public port of the custom T3 channel in admin server
Public port of the custom T3 channel in WebLoigc cluster
True to use latest supported Kubernetes version.
True to enable HPA for auto scaling.
True to set up internal load balancer service.
User provided ACR for base image
User provided base image path
Use Oracle images or user provided patched images
VNET for Application Gateway.
To mitigate ARM-TTK error: Control Named vnetForApplicationGateway must output the resourceGroup property when hideExisting is false

shellCmdtoConnectAks.value: [format('az account set --subscription {0}; az aks get-credentials --resource-group {1} --name {2}', split(subscription().id, '/')[2], if(variables('_enableCustomSSL'), reference(resourceId('Microsoft.Resources/deployments', 'setup-wls-cluster-with-custom-ssl-enabled'), '2022-09-01'), reference(resourceId('Microsoft.Resources/deployments', 'setup-wls-cluster'), '2022-09-01')).outputs.aksClusterRGName.value, if(variables('_enableCustomSSL'), reference(resourceId('Microsoft.Resources/deployments', 'setup-wls-cluster-with-custom-ssl-enabled'), '2022-09-01'), reference(resourceId('Microsoft.Resources/deployments', 'setup-wls-cluster'), '2022-09-01')).outputs.aksClusterName.value)]
